entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT, Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM EST Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 26 April 2016
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: NNW 48 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 11.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
